statements: DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND temperature < 20.5;
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 60 OR (rainfall > 5.0 AND wind_speed < 10.0);
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM crop_yield WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND yield = 1000;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM crop_yield WHERE yield > 1000 AND date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM CropData WHERE crop_name='Corn' AND planting_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM YieldAnalysis WHERE analysis_date <= '2021-12-31' AND predicted_yield < 5000;
